content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Maryam,

Let's focus on the rental price for the apartment. What is the price you are willing to pay for this newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too low for me, Maryam. I am looking for a higher price. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is still not satisfactory, Maryam. I am hoping for a higher price for this prime location. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is better, Maryam, but I am still hoping for a higher price for this prime location. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is closer to my expectations, Maryam. But remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I am still hoping for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 850 euros is the lowest I can go. I can't give you a lower price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Maryam. Let's agree on the price of 900 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
